Computer Science Research

Luca Pinello Lab

Data Science Intern

June 2020 - Present

pinellolab.org

Located at Massachusetts General Hospital (MGH) Cancer Center, Harvard University.

Applied python (pandas) in Jupyter Notebooks, for STREAM analysis of hematopoietic scRNA-seq data. Prepared dataset uploaded to singlecellvr.com ’Kowalczyk et al C57_LTHSC - STREAM - scRNA-seq’ in GitHub. Article under review; Stein, D., Chen, H., Vinyard, M., Qin, Q., Combs, R.D., Zhang, Q., Pinello, L. SinglecellVR: interactive visualization of single-cell data in virtual reality (Computational Genomics, Frontiers in Genetics).

Nancy Kanwisher Lab

Summer Intern

May 2018 - August 2018

kanwisherlab.org

Located at the Picower Institute for Learning and Memory, Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT).

Applied HTML and python graphical user interfaces (GUIs) to develop digital oscillator. Web based app can be used for human color memory analysis.

Biology Research

Biogen

Wet-lab biologist

June 2018

biogencommunitylab.com

Located in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

Applied PCR to A.victoria jellyfish blue fluorescent protein (BFP) cDNA for site-directed mutagenesis (Y66H). Modification turned BFP to green fluorescent protein (GFP). Performed bacteria transformation, gel electrophoresis (agarose and PAGE), chemiluminescence, and spectrophotometry. Used for cell visualization. Lab Director: Dr. Alazar Ayele

BioBuilder Biology Research Epicenter

Wet-lab biologist

February 2020

biobuilder.org

Located in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

Applied PCR to S.cerevisiae yeast DNA. Identified colonies with β-carotene producing gene (crtYB). Applied restriction digest and gel electrophoresis. Used to identify yeast culture that fortifies bread with Vitamin A. Lab Director: Dr. Vivek Bajaj

Community Service

MIT Museum

Teen Programming Council Member

September 2017 - May 2019

mitmuseum.mit.edu

Located in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

Organized symposia (Science Cafés) for Boston area teens. Delivered opening remarks.
